org.apache.beam.runners.direct

Interface DirectOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationNameOptions, HasDisplayData, PipelineOptions

    public interface DirectOptions
extends PipelineOptions, ApplicationNameOptions
    Options that can be used to configure the DirectRunner.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DirectOptions.AvailableParallelismFactory
      A DefaultValueFactory that returns the result of Runtime.availableProcessors() from the DirectOptions.AvailableParallelismFactory.create(PipelineOptions) method.
